item.title: Help code quoted and screenshot of errors
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

jc would you mind showing me exactly where to put the bracket ive tried a line above and on the same line still 3 errors =[

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) {
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs.2794,
                                    npcs.3322)
                                    > 0) {
                                if (npcs.npcType == NPC ID) {
                                    npcs.RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;

untouched codes there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help code quoted and screenshot of errors
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

heres the code thats causing the errors.

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client) p; 
                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].2794,
                                    npcs[i].3322)
                                    > 0) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) {
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;</blockquote>

its supposed too stop npc’s being aggressive towards staff and staff only in my staffzone, so say if i normal player glitched into the staff zone the npc’s would kill them.

EDIT: im on a delta source, could someone try and work the errors out?

Read full topic
